conbody.p: The main page displays the information that you have selected from the dashboard, search results and so on. The page consists of multiple panels which contain the information in table or graphical format. For more information about the panel, hover over the panel's help icon ().

Where applicable, some information may be downloaded via the panel:
graphical data: Click the download icon in the panel () to download the graphic. You can download the information in various formats (PNG, JPEG, PDF, SVG) or direct it to a printer.
tables: Click the Export to CSV link in the panel to download the data in CSV format.
